title: Prefigurative Community Building (Part 25): Consent-Based Conflict Transformation Circles - A Power With Approach to Healing Harm
summary: Non-hierarchical, non-punitive methods of responding to conflict and harm that center consent, accountability, healing, and collective responsibility.

Community.summary: Build capacity for non-punitive conflict resolution through consent-based healing circles.

level0: Study transformative justice principles and practices
Form a small trusted group to learn conflict transformation together
Practice active listening and non-violent communication
level1: Develop community agreements for handling conflict
Practice facilitating with low-stakes conflict scenarios
Create trauma-informed and accessible conflict processes
level2: Facilitate actual consent-based conflict transformation circles
Provide ongoing support and follow-up care for participants
Train others in transformative justice practices
level3: Build community-wide capacity for transformative justice
Support development of multiple autonomous conflict transformation circles
Advocate for transformative justice alternatives to punitive systems

Knowledge.summary: Develop and share knowledge about transformative justice and consent-based conflict resolution.

level0: Learn about transformative justice vs punitive justice models
Study successful conflict transformation projects like Creative Interventions
level1: Practice consensus decision-making and consent culture
Document your conflict transformation processes and learning
level2: Host workshops on transformative justice and conflict transformation
Create resources about consent-based healing practices
level3: Develop comprehensive transformative justice organizing toolkits
Research and document alternatives to carceral responses to harm

Narrative.summary: Challenge punitive justice narratives and promote stories of healing-centered accountability.

level0: Share stories of successful transformative justice processes
Challenge narratives that equate justice with punishment
level1: Advocate for consent-based approaches to community conflict
Write and share experiences of healing-centered accountability
level2: Lead community discussions about alternatives to carceral logic
Create media highlighting transformative justice successes
level3: Contribute to cultural shift toward transformative rather than punitive justice
Mentor others in articulating visions of healing-centered community response
